page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE
page.content: {A Day in the life of an eight year old {Schoolgirl.} My Daddy wakes me up at half past six and gives me a drink of orange squash and then I read a library book for a few minutes. I get dressed into my school clothes and I go downstairs to eat my breakfast. For my breakfast I have a bowl of cereals and some toast and marmalade. After breakfast I practice my piano tunes then I read for a while. Then I have a wash and brush my teeth. My Daddy or my Mummy takes me to school. When I get to school I go out to play. School starts at nine o' clock. We go to assembly and have a song and a story and then we say some prayers.
